name: Disney's Chicken Little
description: Based on Walt Disney’s feature 3D animation film Chicken Little, Chicken Little the action-packed video game catapults you into the hair-raising adventures of the movie and beyond.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP2 Processor: Pentium™ 4 class processor 1.4 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB DirectX™ -compatible video card, 32-bit color (NVIDIA GeForce 3 or equivalent) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1536 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit DirectX™ -compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Nostalgia is fun. This game is the game that drove me to start swearing at games, this and the AVGN did. This game always ♥♥♥♥♥♥ me off, especially the parts of the Goosey Chase and such, as I remember I would always screw up on them and yell at the screen while having a tantrum, trying to break the controller. Good memories...   Otherwise, don't listen to the negative report since it's a stupid reason to dislike, a simple error he only pointed out and it's easy to fix. Yeah, it's not a perfect port, but it works. No game is perfect.   Get this game if you had it in your childhood, it's sure nostalgic.

Actually my favourite game of all time. It's amazing. The music, the graphics, the level design, the game mechanics. All perfectly put together to create one game that is often overlooked as being an 'average movie tie-in for an average movie'.  For the sequel: -VR -More Barenaked Ladies -More Fish -More Dodgeball -More Driving (free-roam world perhaps??) -More Baseball -More collecting items -More weapons
It's really good game  Good graphics  and one more question what did they use to make Chicken little game what program?
honestly one of the best games ive ever played
